price: “Ja sam vidio ono što oni nisu vidjeli”, odgovori on, “pa sam šaku zemlje ispod izaslanikove stope uzeo i to bacio – i eto tako je u mojoj duši ponikla zla misao.”
arabic: قَالَ بَصُرۡتُ بِمَا لَمۡ يَبۡصُرُواْ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضۡتُ قَبۡضَةٗ مِّنۡ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذۡتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتۡ لِي نَفۡسِي

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla baṣur'tu bimā lam yabṣurū bihi faqabaḍtu qabḍatan min athari al-rasūli fanabadhtuhā wakadhālika sawwalat lī nafsī
